description:
Saji and the delicate magician who shares his name use Ryofu as the centerpiece of a heinous plan to awaken the dragon lurking within Ryomou!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Qui additionne de nombreux atouts sera victorieux
San Ooki wa Kachi San Sukunaki wa Katazu
The Bigger Odds Wins, the Smaller Odds Loses
算多きは勝ち算少なきは勝たず
